values.name: Verified
values.description: Formally verified robustness against a wide range of evasion attacks.

values.name: Robust
values.description: Robust to most known evasion attacks, multiple defense mechanisms employed.

values.name: Susceptible
values.description: Susceptible to some evasion attacks, basic adversarial training or input validation in place.

values.name: Highly Susceptible
values.description: Highly susceptible to common evasion attacks. No or minimal defenses.
